experiences.title: Experiences
experiences.fekamt:
(European Karate-do and Traditional Martial Arts Federation)

 Technos : HTML, CSS, JS, PHP

 The Fekamt is a organisation with a numerous amount members across all Europe. The Fekamt uses a website to manage its members, events and news.

 My responsibilities were to maintain and improve the website, as well as to develop new features. Such as members filtering, pdf creation out of the members list.
I also had to write the documentation for the website, for new developers to be able to work on the website.
